    right="Feat 12"

>
[Expert Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=707) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 225 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=702); Master in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

<title level="2">Expert Druid Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Master Druid Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=708)
name: Expert Druid Spellcasting
